activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13030
activity.text: Labeling the PRs based on the changes in src/types/**

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12980
activity.text:
Solution: For this we can create a GitHub action workflow and in that we can use an action: actions/labeler@v5.  This action is maintained by the GitHub, so it is safe. And by this we can automatically label the PR if there is change in the src/type/** path and if in later commits the changes are removed then label get automatically removed using the "sync-label" attribute of it.

Timeline: By End of the day.

Additional Context: https://github.com/actions/labeler
